quest.name: The Will to Live
objectives: Steal a suitable uniform from a sleeping soldier.
While in uniform, perform an /imperialsalute to the guards.

dialogue.name: YUGIRI
dialogue.text: Despite the urgency of the situation, we must still proceed with the utmost caution to ensure the safety of the villagers.

dialogue.name: YUGIRI
dialogue.text: To wit, we must infiltrate the castrum without raising the alarum.

dialogue.name: YUGIRI
dialogue.text: I will deal with any soldiers near the entrance. Stand watch for others approaching from the north until you hear my signal.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: For a mercy, you spy no imperial patrols bound for the castrum. A hawk's cry pierces the silence─Yugiri is waiting.

dialogue.name: BIGSOLDIER02496
dialogue.text: Mmm... Mmm... No, you sign off first... <snore>

dialogue.name: MIDDLESOLDIER02496
dialogue.text: <snore> ...Five...five more minutes...

dialogue.name: SMALLSOLDIER02496
dialogue.text: Sodding...<snore>...sodding cu─<snort>─sodding...the lot of you...

dialogue.name: YUGIRI
dialogue.text: Speak softly, lest the others hear us. What of the outside?

dialogue.name: YUGIRI
dialogue.text: ...That is good. We may proceed as planned.

dialogue.name: YUGIRI
dialogue.text: These ones shall not soon wake. However, the others are too close to the villagers. Incapacitating them as I did these ones is far too risky.

dialogue.name: YUGIRI
dialogue.text: Fortunately, a solution presents itself. I would have you disguise yourself as an imperial soldier and convince them that a changing of the guard is in order.

dialogue.name: YUGIRI
dialogue.text: You have your pick of uniforms. They shall not protest.

dialogue.name: YUGIRI
dialogue.text: I would not presume to choose for you. You know your own proportions best.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: This uniform appears to be more or less your size...

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Although this unform is quite large in several places, with a few minor adjustments, it appears as though it could suffice...

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Although this uniform is a little large for your tastes, with a few minor adjustments, it appears as though it could suffice...

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: If there were three of you standing on each other's shoulders, you could perhaps fit into this uniform. Walking, however, would present a challenge.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: This uniform is far too large for you to wear comfortably.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: This uniform appears to be more or less your size...

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: ...It would probably be considered obscene to wear this uniform in polite company.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Attempting to wear this uniform might force you to confront certain uncomfortable realities better left unexplored...

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Perhaps, in another life, this uniform would have suited you perfectly. But not this one.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: ...Upon further consideration, you realize that such ambition would better serve you on the battlefield.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: ...Though it is often said that one should aspire to bigger and better things, it would not be prudent at this juncture.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Although this uniform is a little small for your tastes, with a few minor adjustments, it appears as though it could suffice...

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: This uniform appears to be more or less your size...

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: With all due care and consideration, you relieve the sleeping soldier of their uniform.

dialogue.name: YUGIRI
dialogue.text: You have chosen one to your liking, then? Excellent.

dialogue.name: YUGIRI
dialogue.text: I shall hide these ones where none will find them.

dialogue.name: YUGIRI
dialogue.text: Our sleeping beauties have been laid to rest in their bunks. Oh, and while I was in the barracks, I happened upon these spare uniforms, in case the items in your possession are not to your liking.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: The sack appears to be filled with a nigh-infinite supply of imperial equipment...though it would be best if you did not attempt to put that cursory assessment to the proof.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: The sack appears to be filled with a nigh-infinite supply of imperial equipment...though it would be best if you did not attempt to put that cursory assessment to the proof.

dialogue.name: YUGIRI
dialogue.text: This kabuto and tekko should match the uwagi, hakama, and choka in your possession...

dialogue.name: YUGIRI
dialogue.text: And with that, you have a full set. I am sure that once you change, it will seem as though it was bespoke.

dialogue.name: YUGIRI
dialogue.text: You will need to give the soldiers guarding the villagers a proper imperial salute to complete the deception and convince them to come here, where I will be waiting to deal with them.

dialogue.name: YUGIRI
dialogue.text: The imperial soldiers assigned to Doma are hardly the Empire's best and brightest. Nevertheless, you will need to approach them in uniform if you wish to convince them you are one of their own.

dialogue.name: YUGIRI
dialogue.text: Do not forget to give them an imperial salute. They may not be the most clever soldiers in the imperial army, but they know protocol.

dialogue.name: YUGIRI
dialogue.text: ...In the strange and inexplicable event that you somehow dispose of all or part of your uniform, you may search these sacks for replacements. Not that there should be any need for that. Certainly not.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: The sack appears to be filled with a nigh-infinite supply of kabuto and tekko...

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Being the prudent and responsible individual that you are, you resolve only to take items to replace those which you may have misplaced under circumstances better left unsaid.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: The sack appears to be filled with a nigh-infinite supply of uwagi, hakama, and choka...

dialogue.name: SOLDIERC02495
dialogue.text: Huh!? How did you get in here! Leave, now!

dialogue.name: SOLDIERC02495
dialogue.text: Oh, hello there. Are you new?

dialogue.name: SOLDIERC02495
dialogue.text: ...I don't know what you're about, but don't think that the provinces are any less strict than the capital. The viceroy does not tolerate insubordination.

dialogue.name: SOLDIERC02495
dialogue.text: Is it time already? Not that I'm complaining, mind, but I thought the others would be gone longer...

dialogue.name: SOLDIERD02496
dialogue.text: Hah hah, very amusing, you. Is this a drill? Am I supposed to bellow, “Rebel insurgents! To arms, to arms!” or some such rot?

dialogue.name: SOLDIERD02496
dialogue.text: Let me guess: hangover, eh? I've been there─woke up once after a late night drinking and didn't find my kabuto until days later. You don't want to know what it was filled with, let me tell you...

dialogue.name: SOLDIERD02496
dialogue.text: ...This is that game where you try to make me guess a word or phrase by gesticulating wildly, isn't it? Hmm...can you do it again?

dialogue.name: SOLDIERD02496
dialogue.text: Changing of the guard, is it? About bloody time. Just looking at these Aan is making me depressed. Reminds me of when I was in their shoes, pissing myself in fear...

dialogue.name: SOLDIERD02496
dialogue.text: Just...just a few more years... <snore>

dialogue.name: YUGIRI
dialogue.text: These ones shall sleep soundly along with the others...

dialogue.name: YUGIRI
dialogue.text: And, with that, there are no more soldiers to trouble us. You can dispose of that accursed uniform too.

dialogue.name: YUGIRI
dialogue.text: It is time to guide the villagers to freedom!

dialogue.name: YUGIRI
dialogue.text: Quickly, we must go to the villagers before more soldiers come!
